title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 901.5 - Records available for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 901.5 - Records available for public inspection

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided by article 10 of the Education

Law and subdivisions 3 and 7 of section 88 of article 6 of the Public Officers

Law, or other provisions of law, the following kinds of the fund's records
shall be available for public inspection and copying: (a) statements of policy adopted by the fund, including statistical or factual tabulations which led to the formulation
thereof; (b) audits and statistical
or factual tabulations made by or for the fund; (c) fund manuals and instructions that affect
members of the public; (d) an
itemized record of names, addresses, titles and salaries of officers and
employees of the fund (for bona fide members of news media, upon written
notice); (e) a record of final votes
of each member of the fund's board of trustees in those proceedings of the fund
on which votes are taken; (f) any
other files, records, papers or documents required by statute to be made
available for public inspection and copying, subject to the common law right or
claim of the fund of privilege or confidentiality. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
901.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
